abstract: Google invites reporters to an Android event next week, raising expectations that it will unveil the Nexus One phone.
snippet: Google invites reporters to an Android event next week, raising expectations that it will unveil the Nexus One phone.
lead_paragraph: Google just invited reporters to an “Android press gathering” on Jan. 5. Google representatives declined to provide any further details about the event, but by all appearances this will be the unveiling of the Nexus One, the Google-designed phone that the company plans to market directly to consumers.

headline.main: Is Google’s Nexus One Phone Landing Next Week?
